// Mock products data for CompareGenius
const mockProducts = [
// Smartphones
{
  id: "1",
  name: 'iPhone 15 Pro Max',
  brand: 'Apple',
  category: 'Smartphones',

  price: 1099,
  rating: 4.8,
  reviewCount: 1243,

  images: ['/images/products/iphone-15-pro-max-1.jpg', '/images/products/iphone-15-pro-max-2.jpg', '/images/products/iphone-15-pro-max-3.jpg'],

    ram: '8GB',

  cons: ['Expensive compared to competitors', 'No USB-C fast charging beyond 27W', 'Limited customization options', 'No charger included in the box'],
  reviews: [{
    id: 1,
    user: 'TechEnthusiast',
    rating: 5,
    date: '2025-02-15',
    title: 'Best iPhone Ever',
    content: 'The iPhone 15 Pro Max is a significant upgrade over previous models. The A17 Pro chip is blazing fast, and the camera system is outstanding. Battery life is excellent, easily lasting a full day of heavy use.'
  }, {
    id: 2,
    user: 'MobilePhotographer',
    rating: 4,
    date: '2025-02-10',
    title: 'Amazing Camera, But Pricey',
    content: 'The camera system on this phone is incredible. The 48MP main sensor captures stunning detail, and the telephoto lens is perfect for portraits. My only complaint is the high price tag, but if photography is important to you, it\'s worth the investment.'
  }]
}, {
  id: "2",
  name: 'Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra',
  brand: 'Samsung',
  category: 'Smartphones',
  description: 'Samsung\'s premium flagship with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 200MP camera, and S Pen functionality.',
  price: 1299,
  rating: 4.7,
  reviewCount: 892,

  images: ['/images/products/samsung-galaxy-s24-ultra.svg', '/images/products/samsung-galaxy-s24-ultra-1.svg', '/images/products/samsung-galaxy-s24-ultra-2.svg', '/images/products/samsung-galaxy-s24-ultra-3.svg'],

    display: '6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X',
    camera: '200MP main, 12MP ultrawide, 10MP telephoto (3x), 10MP telephoto (10x)',
    battery: '5,000 mAh',
    os: 'Android 13, One UI 5.1',
    dimensions: '163.4 x 78.1 x 8.9 mm',
    weight: '234g'
  },
  pros: ['Exceptional camera system with 200MP main sensor', 'S Pen functionality', 'Excellent display', 'Powerful performance', 'Long battery life'],
  cons: ['Expensive', 'Large and heavy', 'Slower charging than some competitors', 'Learning curve for full feature utilization'],
  reviews: [{
    id: 1,
    user: 'AndroidFan',
    rating: 5,

    title: 'The Ultimate Android Phone',
    content: 'This phone has everything you could want. The camera is incredible, the S Pen is useful for note-taking and drawing, and the performance is top-notch. Battery easily lasts all day even with heavy use.'
  }]
},
// Laptops
{

sourcesContent:
// Mock products data for CompareGenius
const mockProducts = [
  // Smartphones
  {
    id: "1",
    name: 'iPhone 15 Pro Max',
    brand: 'Apple',
    category: 'Smartphones',
    description: 'Apple\'s flagship smartphone with A17 Pro chip, 48MP camera system, and titanium design.',
    price: 1099,
    rating: 4.8,
    reviewCount: 1243,
    image: '/images/products/iphone-15-pro-max.jpg',
    images: [
      '/images/products/iphone-15-pro-max-1.jpg',
      '/images/products/iphone-15-pro-max-2.jpg',
      '/images/products/iphone-15-pro-max-3.jpg',
    ],
    specs: {
      processor: 'A17 Pro',
      ram: '8GB',
      storage: '256GB/512GB/1TB',
      display: '6.7-inch Super Retina XDR',
      camera: '48MP main, 12MP ultrawide, 12MP telephoto',
      battery: '4,422 mAh',
      os: 'iOS 17',
      dimensions: '159.9 x 76.7 x 8.25 mm',
      weight: '221g',
    },
    pros: [
      'Exceptional performance with A17 Pro chip',
      'Outstanding camera system',
      'Premium titanium build quality',
      'Excellent battery life',
      'iOS ecosystem and long-term software support',
    ],
    cons: [
      'Expensive compared to competitors',
      'No USB-C fast charging beyond 27W',
      'Limited customization options',
      'No charger included in the box',
    ],
    reviews: [
      {
        id: 1,
        user: 'TechEnthusiast',
        rating: 5,
        date: '2025-02-15',
        title: 'Best iPhone Ever',
        content: 'The iPhone 15 Pro Max is a significant upgrade over previous models. The A17 Pro chip is blazing fast, and the camera system is outstanding. Battery life is excellent, easily lasting a full day of heavy use.',
      },
      {
        id: 2,
        user: 'MobilePhotographer',
        rating: 4,
        date: '2025-02-10',
        title: 'Amazing Camera, But Pricey',
        content: 'The camera system on this phone is incredible. The 48MP main sensor captures stunning detail, and the telephoto lens is perfect for portraits. My only complaint is the high price tag, but if photography is important to you, it\'s worth the investment.',
      },
    ],
  },
  {
    id: "2",
    name: 'Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra',
    brand: 'Samsung',
    category: 'Smartphones',
    description: 'Samsung\'s premium flagship with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 200MP camera, and S Pen functionality.',
    price: 1299,
    rating: 4.7,
    reviewCount: 892,
    image: '/images/products/samsung-galaxy-s24-ultra.svg',
    images: [
      '/images/products/samsung-galaxy-s24-ultra.svg',
      '/images/products/samsung-galaxy-s24-ultra-1.svg',
      '/images/products/samsung-galaxy-s24-ultra-2.svg',
      '/images/products/samsung-galaxy-s24-ultra-3.svg',
    ],
    specs: {
      processor: 'Snapdragon 8 Gen 3',
      ram: '12GB',
      storage: '256GB/512GB/1TB',
      display: '6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X',
      camera: '200MP main, 12MP ultrawide, 10MP telephoto (3x), 10MP telephoto (10x)',
      battery: '5,000 mAh',
      os: 'Android 13, One UI 5.1',
      dimensions: '163.4 x 78.1 x 8.9 mm',
      weight: '234g',
    },
    pros: [
      'Exceptional camera system with 200MP main sensor',
      'S Pen functionality',
      'Excellent display',
      'Powerful performance',
      'Long battery life',
    ],
    cons: [
      'Expensive',
      'Large and heavy',
      'Slower charging than some competitors',
      'Learning curve for full feature utilization',
    ],
    reviews: [
      {
        id: 1,
        user: 'AndroidFan',
        rating: 5,
        date: '2025-01-30',
        title: 'The Ultimate Android Phone',
        content: 'This phone has everything you could want. The camera is incredible, the S Pen is useful for note-taking and drawing, and the performance is top-notch. Battery easily lasts all day even with heavy use.',
      },
    ],
  },
  
  // Laptops
  {
    id: "3",
    name: 'MacBook Pro 16-inch',
    brand: 'Apple',
    category: 'Laptops',
    description: 'Powerful laptop with M3 Pro/Max chip, stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, and exceptional battery life.',
    price: 2499,
    rating: 4.9,
    reviewCount: 782,
    image: '/images/products/macbook-pro-16.jpg',
    images: [
      '/images/products/macbook-pro-16-1.jpg',
      '/images/products/macbook-pro-16-2.jpg',
      '/images/products/macbook-pro-16-3.jpg',
    ],
    specs: {
      processor: 'Apple M3 Pro/Max',
      ram: '32GB',
      storage: '1TB SSD',
      display: '16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR',
      graphics: 'Integrated Apple GPU',
      battery: 'Up to 22 hours',
      os: 'macOS Sonoma',
      ports: '3x Thunderbolt 4, HDMI, SD card slot, MagSafe',
      weight: '4.7 lbs (2.1 kg)',
    },
    pros: [
      'Exceptional performance for creative professionals',
      'Outstanding display quality',
      'Excellent keyboard and trackpad',
      'Class-leading battery life',
      'Great speakers and microphones',
    ],
    cons: [
      'Expensive',
      'Limited upgradeability',
      'No touchscreen option',
      'Heavier than ultraportable alternatives',
    ],
    reviews: [
      {
        id: 1,
        user: 'CreativePro',
        rating: 5,
        date: '2025-03-01',
        title: 'Perfect for Professional Work',
        content: 'As a video editor and photographer, this machine is a dream. The M3 Max chip handles 4K and even 8K video editing with ease. The display is color-accurate and the battery life means I can work all day without plugging in.',
      },
    ],
  },
  {
    id: "4",
    name: 'Dell XPS 15',
    brand: 'Dell',
    category: 'Laptops',
    description: 'Premium Windows laptop with 13th Gen Intel processors, OLED display option, and sleek design.',
    price: 1899,
    rating: 4.6,
    reviewCount: 543,
    image: '/images/products/dell-xps-15.jpg',
    images: [
      '/images/products/dell-xps-15-1.jpg',
      '/images/products/dell-xps-15-2.jpg',
      '/images/products/dell-xps-15-3.jpg',
    ],
    specs: {
      processor: 'Intel Core i9-13900H',
      ram: '32GB DDR5',
      storage: '1TB NVMe SSD',
      display: '15.6-inch 3.5K OLED touch display',
      graphics: 'NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070',
      battery: 'Up to 12 hours',
      os: 'Windows 11 Pro',
      ports: '2x Thunderbolt 4, USB-C, SD card reader',
      weight: '4.23 lbs (1.92 kg)',
    },
    pros: [
      'Beautiful OLED display option',
      'Powerful performance for creative work',
      'Premium build quality',
      'Excellent keyboard',
      'Good port selection',
    ],
    cons: [
      'Battery life could be better',
      'Gets hot under heavy load',
      'Expensive with higher configurations',
      'Webcam quality is just average',
    ],
    reviews: [
      {
        id: 1,
        user: 'WindowsPower',
        rating: 4,
        date: '2025-02-20',
        title: 'Great Windows Alternative to MacBook Pro',
        content: 'The XPS 15 is a beautiful machine with plenty of power for creative work. The OLED display is stunning with perfect blacks and vibrant colors. My only complaint is that the battery life isn\'t as good as advertised when doing intensive tasks.',
      },
    ],
  },
  
  // Headphones
  {
    id: "5",
    name: 'Sony WH-1000XM5',
    brand: 'Sony',
    category: 'Headphones',
    description: 'Industry-leading noise cancelling headphones with exceptional sound quality and comfort.',
    price: 399,
    rating: 4.8,
    reviewCount: 1567,
    image: '/images/products/sony-wh-1000xm5.jpg',
    images: [
      '/images/products/sony-wh-1000xm5-1.jpg',
      '/images/products/sony-wh-1000xm5-2.jpg',
      '/images/products/sony-wh-1000xm5-3.jpg',
    ],
    specs: {
      type: 'Over-ear, closed-back',
      driver: '30mm carbon fiber composite',
      frequency: '4Hz-40,000Hz',
      battery: 'Up to 30 hours with ANC',
      charging: 'USB-C, 3 hours full charge',
      connectivity: 'Bluetooth 5.2, 3.5mm wired',
      anc: 'Adaptive noise cancellation with 8 microphones',
      weight: '250g',
    },
    pros: [
      'Best-in-class noise cancellation',
      'Excellent sound quality',
      'Very comfortable for long sessions',
      'Great battery life',
      'Useful companion app with EQ',
    ],
    cons: [
      'Expensive',
